name: vibe-coding-methodology
description: Implementation of Nicolas Zullo's Ultimate Guide to Vibe Coding v1.2 - planning-first workflow with memory-bank system

changes.description: Established memory-bank system with PRD.md, tech-stack.md, implementation-plan.md, architecture.md, progress.md
changes.impact: Long-term AI memory system prevents workflow amnesia and ensures consistent development approach

changes.description: Implemented planning-first workflow requiring memory-bank review before any code changes
changes.impact: Forces structured approach: read memory-bank → clarify requirements → implement one step at a time → verify → update docs

changes.description: Enforced step-by-step verification with user confirmation before proceeding to next step
changes.impact: Prevents scope creep and ensures each step is fully tested before moving forward

changes.description: Established modular architecture with prohibition of giant files and mandatory file size limits
changes.impact: Maintains codebase maintainability and prevents monolithic file growth

changes.description: Required updates to progress.md and architecture.md after completing each major feature/milestone
changes.impact: Creates comprehensive development history and decision documentation
